name: Frolicking Fish
summary:
The title pretty much says it: fish and other marine life dance and frolic to various tunes. An octopus keeps spoiling the fun in various ways. 
　　The first cartoon that introduced continuous movements or ’overlapping action’ in animation, instead of the old stop-and-go movements.
info:
• 中文名: 群鱼乱舞
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1930-05-08
  • 片长: 6m
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 导演: Burt Gillett
